name: Aarav Reddy
warning_signs: Severe swelling in legs, ankles, or face
follow_up_instructions: Monitor blood pressure daily and log readings
Limit sodium intake to 2000mg per day
Report any signs of infection immediately

discharge_summary:
Patient Aarav Reddy was admitted on 2025-08-15 with Diabetic Nephropathy. 
During hospitalization, patient was managed with Insulin glargine 20 units at bedtime, Metformin 500mg twice daily, Metoprolol 50mg twice daily. 
No procedures were performed.
Patient's condition improved and was stable at discharge. 
Discharged home with instructions to follow up with nephrologist and continue medications as prescribed. 
Patient educated on warning signs and dietary restrictions.
